projects.name: ChatApp
projects.description: Basic real-time chat application using Node.js, Socket.IO, React, and Tailwind CSS, containerized with Docker and hosted on an AWS EC2 instance. it provides a reliable and responsive chat experience.

projects.name: SortingAlgoVisualizer
projects.description: Sorting algorithm visualizer using React and Tailwind CSS, providing an interactive and educational tool to illustrate how various sorting algorithms work. The visualizer supports multiple algorithms and features dynamic animations.

projects.name: ticTacToeAI
projects.description: Tic Tac Toe site with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling users to play against an AI powered by the Minimax algorithm. The AI provides an optimal challenge, ensuring a competitive and engaging experience.

projects.name: RealTime Object Detection And Tracking
projects.description: Object detection and tracking system using YOLOv8, achieving real-time performance and high accuracy in identifying and following multiple objects in dynamic scenes.
